[[Search engine]] companies including Google, [[Yahoo!]] and [[A9.com]] now also offer Firefox [[List of Firefox extensions|extensions]] for accessing their services, in addition to their original Internet Explorer add-ons. Google has released four Extensions for Firefox,<ref>[http://toolbar.google.com/firefox/extensions/index.html Google Firefox Extensions<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> further affirming the company's interest in Firefox.
